details: A remedy for chronic gouty patients uric acid diathesis, indicated in bronchitis and NODOSITIES OF THE JOINTS OF THE FINGERS and backs of the hands. Facial paralysis. Pain in shoulder-joint. Tightness around chest. Heaviness of limbs, unsteady, tottering gait. Coldness from least draft of air.

Head: Sneezing with excessive running from nose and eyes, ONLY IN MORNING
Respiratory: Deep rough cough with greenish expectoration

name: Ammonium phosphoricum
